section:
Data Structures Here are the data structures with brief descriptions:dec_datetime
The date/time format used in the Primary Volume Descriptor dir_datetime
The date/time format used by directory records directory
A collection of directory records which together make a single directory directory_record
A directory record file_flags
The file flags for a directory record index_entryindex_filepath_tablepath_table_entryvolume_descriptorvolume_descriptor_data
The data section of a primary volume descriptor
